detail_desc: Jumper knitted in a mohair blend with long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar, classic front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Wide top in sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover drawstring hood, worn details and reverse-stitched seams. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a raw-edge hem. Slightly longer at the back. Soft brushed inside.

Hi-top trainers in imitation leather with a lightly padded edge and tongue. Elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front, and a grosgrain loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Fine-knit sports socks in a soft cotton blend with a ribbed shaft.

Wide top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a lace collar and small embroidery detail on the chest. Opening and button at the back of the neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Large scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides.
Body in soft lace with a straight cut at the top, mesh-lined cups with removable inserts, adjustable shoulder straps and a string back.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a reversible sequin motif on the front, short slits in the sides and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Three-strand metal necklace with three different pendants. Adjustable length 38-44.5 cm.
Trousers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets and ribbed hems.

Cotton poplin shirt with a button-down collar, open chest pocket and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a text print on the front and round, rib-trimmed neckline.

Shirt in soft, brushed cotton twill with a button-down collar, classic front, open chest pocket and yoke with a hanger at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Lace Brazilian briefs with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.
T-shirt in soft, ribbed cotton jersey with an embroidered appliqué on the chest and rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton pointelle jersey with a button placket and picot trim around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Baby Exclusive. Set with a long-sleeved top and trousers in soft organic cotton jersey. Top with a concealed press-stud on the shoulder. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Boots in imitation suede with pointed toes, covered heels and a shaft that is rounded at the top. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 8 cm.
Short, jacquard-weave skirt with a concealed zip at the back. Lined.
Vest top in soft linen jersey with a deep V-neck front and back.
Fitted strappy top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend.
Dress with a top in soft, fine-knit cotton and a collar and skirt in a viscose weave. Long sleeves with a narrow ribbed trim at the cuffs.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details in a slightly looser fit with a regular waist, zip fly with a button and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Dress in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, detachable belt, long raglan sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs and a gently rounded hem. Unlined.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with ribbed trims, a V-neck and buttons down the front.
Treggings in stretch, denim-look jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Trousers in a crêpe weave with an elasticated waist, side pockets and wide, slightly shorter legs.

5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs. Shaping – denim with a stretch function that holds in and shapes the waist, thighs and bum while keeping the jeans in shape.
Double-breasted, hooded cardigan in soft, purl-knit cotton with heart-shaped buttons at the top.
Sleeveless, wrapover body in jersey with a deep V-neck front and back. Relaxed fit at the top with gathers and wide shoulder straps, a seam at the waist and a gusset with press-studs.
Straight-style shirt in linen with a turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Swimsuit with flounces down the front that continue over the shoulders and join at the back. Lined front.

Sandals with an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle and a strap at the front with a feather trim. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. The feathers are Fairtrade marked. Covered heels 11 cm.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Twisted tube scarf in a soft knit.

Rain jacket in wind- and water-repellent functional fabric with closed seams and a detachable, pile-lined hood. Zip down the front with a chin guard, flap front pockets with a press-stud, elastication at the cuffs and a single back vent. Pile lining.

Short shirt dress in a Tencel™ lyocell weave with a collar, buttons down the front and flap chest pockets with a button. Seam with a drawstring at the waist and 3/4-length sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Unlined.
Fitted T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey.

Joggers in stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a fake back pocket and flap leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening. Tapered legs with decorative seams and elasticated hems.

ANNA GLOVER x H&M. Loose-fitting, short-sleeved blouse in a textured viscose crêpe weave with a V-neck and pleat at the front. Dropped shoulders with decorative gathers, a gathered yoke at the back and slits in the sides. Longer at the back.

Short-sleeved playsuit in softly draping woven fabric made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend with notch lapels and concealed buttons at the top. Flap chest pockets, a yoke at the back, elastication at the back of the waist and a detachable tie belt. Short, wide legs with pleats at the top and pockets in the side seams. Unlined.

Hooded jacket and a pair of joggers in soft velour made from a cotton blend. Jacket with a lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, a divided, frill-trimmed kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Jersey lining. Joggers with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Swim shorts in a patterned weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Mesh inner shorts.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Smart shirt in a woven cotton blend with a button-down collar and buttons down the front and at the cuffs. Matching tie/bow tie.
Short-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric.
Pull-on trousers in a viscose weave with elastication and a decorative bow at the waist, side pockets and elasticated hems. One patterned pair.
T-shirt in soft, organic cotton jersey with a narrow ribbed trim around the neckline.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication at the waist and side pockets.
Short A-line skirt.

Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a jersey-lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Short, fitted skirt in slightly stretchy woven fabric with a high waist and concealed zip and slit at the back. Woven lining made from recycled polyester.
Jumper in a soft knit in a slightly wider style with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Ultra-light running shorts in fast-drying, functional, breathable fabric with an elasticated waist and ventilating mesh sections in the sides. Concealed key pocket in the waistband, side pockets, short slits in the sides and reflective details. Lined. the shorts weigh 120 grammes in size M.
Sleeveless playsuit in soft, organic cotton jersey with a decorative bow on the shoulder straps and an elasticated seam at the waist.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and side pockets.
Small bucket bag in grained imitation leather with a drawstring closure, magnetic fastener at the top and a narrow shoulder strap. Size 12x16x19.5 cm.
Short dress in ribbed jersey with a round neckline, long sleeves and a straight-cut hem.
Vest tops in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a rounded hem.
Suit waistcoat in woven fabric with lining fabric at the back. Buttons at the front, a chest pocket, welt front pockets and an adjustable tab at the back. Lined.
Tops in soft organic cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder and long puff sleeves. Picot trim around the neckline and cuffs.
Boxer shorts in satin with an elasticated waist, fake fly and long legs.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
5-pocket jeans in washed cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and straight legs with slits at the hems. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Boots in leather with a soft shaft and square toes. The shaft is stretchy at the top. Organic cotton linings and leather insoles. Heel 6 cm.
T-shirt in soft jersey.
Long-sleeved bolero in fine-knit cotton with shimmering, reversible sequins on the front (sizes 1½-3Y with normal sequins) and a button at the top.
Cotton jersey dress with a short-sleeved top layer in lace, a gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Boots in imitation leather with an ankle-height shaft, lacing at the front and a zip in one side. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 2 cm.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
Fitted vest top in ribbed cotton jersey with a slightly deeper neckline at the back.
Fully lined bikini top with a knot at the front and no fastening.

Long wrap dress in airy chiffon with a V-neck front and back and short flounced sleeves. Flounced trim around the V-neck at the back, a seam and narrow tie belt at the waist and a softly draping skirt. Lined.
5-pocket skinny-fit trousers in washed, stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly.
Short, A-line coat in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, side pockets and a pleat at the back. Lined.

No-show trainer socks in a fine, fast-drying, functional knit. The socks are low cut so they are hidden inside your shoes. Ribbed section over the foot and a concealed silicone trim at the heels for best fit. The polyester content of the socks is partly recycled.
Short dress in jersey containing glittery threads with a wide neckline, dropped shoulders and 3/4-length sleeves. Gathers in the side seams for best fit over the tummy.
Knee socks in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with a decorative satin bow at the top.
Hipster briefs in microfibre with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
